execution_plan.description: Retrieve all messages along with the username of the sender from the app_chat database by joining messages and users on messages.sended_by = users.id.
execution_plan.query: SELECT m.id AS message_id, m.content, m.sended_by, m.chat_id, m.sended_at, u.username AS sender_username FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.sended_by = u.id;
